text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Predator Helios 300 G3-572-72YF 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the Acer Predator Helios 300 G3-572-72YF 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the Acer Predator Helios 300 G3-572-72YF 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Apex Legends. The build quality of the Acer Predator Helios 300 G3-572-72YF 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Fortnite. The build quality of the Acer Predator Helios 300 G3-572-72YF 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
